alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Madison (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison and northeastern Chenango Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Lebanon, or 8 miles southwest of Hamilton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Sherburne, Lebanon, New Berlin, Columbus, Georgetown, Earlville, Smyrna, Poolville and South Lebanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
